title: can anyone identify this font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092704im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pen_5544.jpg)

I have finally managed to upload this.  
Is anyone able to give me a hand with identifying this font?  
Many thanks,  
pigeoninpjs

 [‹ (x) 1960s/70s The Omega Man - Rubens {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2613 "Go to previous forum topic") [Supa Funky font id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43396 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pigeoninpjs

comments.content:
Looks like Ed Roman from House Industries

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092704/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts")
Ed Roman, part of the [Ed Benguiat Font Collection from House](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092704/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&category=&id=150#150).
